languages.text: {n}Вультур дергается от окрика. На мгновение на ее лице расцветает тот же гнев, что вы уже видели перед судом — но на этот раз его заметили не только вы, но и маршал. Стракс изгибает бровь.{/n}

{n}Vultur flinches at your outburst. For a moment, the anger you saw before the trial blossoms once more on her face, but this time you are not the only one to witness it — the Marshal sees it too. He arches an eyebrow.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вультур дергается от окрика. На мгновение на ее лице расцветает тот же гнев, что вы уже видели перед судом — но на этот раз его заметили не только вы, но и маршал. Стракс изгибает бровь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vultur flinches at your outburst. For a moment, the anger you saw before the trial blossoms once more on her face, but this time you are not the only one to witness it — the Marshal sees it too. He arches an eyebrow.{/n}

{n}Vultur flinches at your outburst. For a moment, the anger you saw before the trial blossoms once more on her face, but this time you are not the only one to witness it — the Marshal sees it too. He arches an eyebrow.{/n}

{n}Vultur flinches at your outburst. For a moment, the anger you saw before the trial blossoms once more on her face, but this time you are not the only one to witness it — the Marshal sees it too. He arches an eyebrow.{/n}

{n}Vultur flinches at your outburst. For a moment, the anger you saw before the trial blossoms once more on her face, but this time you are not the only one to witness it — the Marshal sees it too. He arches an eyebrow.{/n}

{n}Vultur flinches at your outburst. For a moment, the anger you saw before the trial blossoms once more on her face, but this time you are not the only one to witness it — the Marshal sees it too. He arches an eyebrow.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vultur zuckt angesichts deines Ausbruchs zurück. Für einen kurzen Moment kehrt die Wut, die du vor der Verhandlung gesehen hast, in ihr Gesicht zurück, aber dieses Mal bemerkst es nicht nur du ... auch der Marschall sieht es. Er hebt eine Augenbraue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur flinches at your outburst. For a moment, the anger you saw before the trial blossoms once more on her face, but this time you are not the only one to witness it — the Marshal sees it too. He arches an eyebrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vultur zuckt angesichts deines Ausbruchs zurück. Für einen kurzen Moment kehrt die Wut, die du vor der Verhandlung gesehen hast, in ihr Gesicht zurück, aber dieses Mal bemerkst es nicht nur du ... auch der Marschall sieht es. Er hebt eine Augenbraue.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vultur vacille sous le coup de votre intervention. La colère que vous aviez décelée avant le procès resurgit brièvement sur son visage, mais cette fois, vous n'êtes pas {mf|le seul|la seule} à la percevoir. Le maréchal la remarque également et hausse un sourcil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur flinches at your outburst. For a moment, the anger you saw before the trial blossoms once more on her face, but this time you are not the only one to witness it — the Marshal sees it too. He arches an eyebrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vultur vacille sous le coup de votre intervention. La colère que vous aviez décelée avant le procès resurgit brièvement sur son visage, mais cette fois, vous n'êtes pas {mf|le seul|la seule} à la percevoir. Le maréchal la remarque également et hausse un sourcil.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在你的怒火面前，沃尔图尔退缩了。那一刻，她脸上再次露出了愠怒之色，正如你在审判之前见到的那样。不过这次，目击者并非只有你一个人。元帅也看到这一幕，扬起了一条眉毛。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur flinches at your outburst. For a moment, the anger you saw before the trial blossoms once more on her face, but this time you are not the only one to witness it — the Marshal sees it too. He arches an eyebrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在你的怒火面前，沃尔图尔退缩了。那一刻，她脸上再次露出了愠怒之色，正如你在审判之前见到的那样。不过这次，目击者并非只有你一个人。元帅也看到这一幕，扬起了一条眉毛。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vultur se acobarda ante tu arrebato. Por un momento, la furia que viste antes del juicio resurge en su rostro, pero esta vez no eres {mf|el|la} únic{mf|o|a} que lo ve: el Mariscal también. Levanta una ceja.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur flinches at your outburst. For a moment, the anger you saw before the trial blossoms once more on her face, but this time you are not the only one to witness it — the Marshal sees it too. He arches an eyebrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vultur se acobarda ante tu arrebato. Por un momento, la furia que viste antes del juicio resurge en su rostro, pero esta vez no eres {mf|el|la} únic{mf|o|a} que lo ve: el Mariscal también. Levanta una ceja.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの突然の怒声に、ヴァルターは思わず身をすくめた。一瞬、裁判の前に見たあの怒りが彼女の顔に再び咲き乱れた。だが今回は、それを見たのはあなただけではない。将帥もそれを目にして、片眉をわずかに上げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur flinches at your outburst. For a moment, the anger you saw before the trial blossoms once more on her face, but this time you are not the only one to witness it — the Marshal sees it too. He arches an eyebrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの突然の怒声に、ヴァルターは思わず身をすくめた。一瞬、裁判の前に見たあの怒りが彼女の顔に再び咲き乱れた。だが今回は、それを見たのはあなただけではない。将帥もそれを目にして、片眉をわずかに上げた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaptığın çıkış karşısında Vultur irkiliyor. Bir anlığına yüzü, duruşmadan önce de gördüğün öfkeyle kaplanıyor. Ancak bu seferkine tek şahit olan sen değilsin... Miralay da görüyor. Bir kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vultur flinches at your outburst. For a moment, the anger you saw before the trial blossoms once more on her face, but this time you are not the only one to witness it — the Marshal sees it too. He arches an eyebrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaptığın çıkış karşısında Vultur irkiliyor. Bir anlığına yüzü, mahkemeden önce de gördüğün öfkeyle kaplanıyor. Ancak bu seferkine tek şahit olan sen değilsin... Miralay da görüyor. Bir kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n}
